main event: A military pilot reported observing a close group of moving lights changing colors in the sky near Terre Haute, Indiana.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 15 minutes.,The lights changed color from red to blue, green, and yellow.,The estimated altitude of the lights ranged from 20,000 ft. to 35,000 ft.,Searchlights from the St. Louis area appeared to be following the unidentified lights.,A check on local aircraft found none to account for the erratic behaviors of the lights.
sighted object: a close group of moving lights
witness description: military pilot of a transport aircraft
